Experis™, the global leader in professional resourcing and project-based workforce solutions. We accelerate organizations’ growth by intensely attracting, assessing and placing specialized expertise in IT, Finance & Accounting and Engineering to precisely deliver in-demand talent for mission-critical positions, enhancing the competitiveness of the organizations and people we serve.Starting as a Recruiter and progressively moving into leadership roles while continuing to do what I love, helping IT Professionals find their next role and helping IT Managers find the talent needed to move their business forward.
Calendar Club runs over 800 seasonal stores throughout the country.  Managed the recruiting of all store owner/operators and managers. In addition, recruited internal staff at corporate office
Small Business which imported and wholesaled hand blown glassware/drinkware to the hospitality industry.
Start up Telecom Company.  Corporate Recruiting

summary: For the past 10+ years I've been recruiting IT professionals for clients ranging from Fortune 500 to growing start-ups, that seek to hire the most sought after technical talent across the country. IT Recruiting Leader with a track record of high performance and exceeding company goals. Experience in high volume, fast paced recruiting while training, mentoring and leading teams up to nine Recruiters. Partner with clients to discover their needs and goals and passionate about finding the best match for the Consultant/Employee and Client. Responsible for reviewing the daily workload and balancing the team’s capacity.Passionate about motivating teams to push beyond their personal expectations. Work with technical executives and hiring managers to qualify requirements and discuss delivery expectations. Keen focus on bringing sales and recruiting teams together to meet client needs. Consistently a top performer achieving top performer trips and awards.
name: Sarah Von Hapsburg
title: Technical Recruiting Lead
